title: How to Draw a Killer Whale

steps.headline: Start by drawing ovals as a basis for the body.
steps.description: Add in guidelines for the facial features, fins and tail.

steps.headline: Now let's sketch in the eyes and mouth.
Sketch in the dorsal fin, it's quite big specially if it's a male.
steps.description: Draw in the flippers and tail as well.

steps.headline: Now sketch the white spots or color separations (Orcas are just usually black and white).
Now outline the image and erase guidelines.
Color it up and you've just drawn your very own Orca!

text: Start by drawing ovals as a basis for the body. Add in guidelines for the facial features, fins and tail. Now let's sketch in the eyes and mouth.  Sketch in the dorsal fin, it's quite big specially if it's a male. Draw in the flippers and tail as well. Now sketch the white spots or color separations (Orcas are just usually black and white).  Now outline the image and erase guidelines.  Color it up and you've just drawn your very own Orca!  Finished.
